name: Fiery Night
overview: Fiery Night is a simpe 2 Player only versus shooter for the Commodore 64. It was released on Tiger-Crew-Disk #035 (02/1997). The developer, however, is still unknown as of right now. The game is different then most game of this nature in that you don't have a point system. Instead, the first one to successfully land a shot is the winner and it just goes back to the title screen.
